<< There are *four* spiders that are considered poisonous in the U.S. The
Hobo
spider (originanlly from Europe and now spreading from Washington state
where it arrived in the 20s or 30s via ship) is also sometimes known as the
boxing spider. >>


Thank you Lynda!That is it the Hobo spider. They are wild.

NICKI~

messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/27/01 9:31:19 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Hi Nanci, I m really happy to hear you re feeling much better.  I was wondering what you were
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/27/01 9:31:19 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> Thank you to everyone for your good wishes. I am sure
> they played a part too!
>
> Nanci K.
>
>
Hi Nanci,

I'm really happy to hear you're feeling much better. I was wondering what
you were taking- and very happy to hear you got the colloidal silver! It's
amazing, and you need so little of it to do the job. I'm thinking of
investing in a little colloidal silver making "machine". It's a little over
a hundred dollars, I think, and definately worth it IMO. And yay to the
soup! That always does wonders! :-)

Vic
